insert into jianli (img, `name`, sex, age, xueli, school, jingyan, phone, address, `position`, jingli, moeny, pingjia, `uid`) values (#{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{xueli,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jingyan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jingli,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{moeny,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pingjia,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update jianli set img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, xueli = #{xueli,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, school = #{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jingyan = #{jingyan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `position` = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jingli = #{jingli,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, moeny = #{moeny,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pingjia = #{pingjia,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `uid` = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, img, `name`, sex, age, xueli, school, jingyan, phone, address, `position`, jingli, moeny, pingjia, `uid` from jianli where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
